"Enjoy the Lost Sea on National Day!":
"Yoohoo! The National Day event is fun, huh!
Only now can you enjoy this time off in
perfect freedom! Are you fully enjoying it?
I heard there's some people who never
come back after this chance to forget
daily ARKS duties and go wherever! It would
be a problem if you didn't come back,
but how about checking out around Lilipur?"

"やっほー！　独立記念日イベント楽しいね！
今だけの完全自由なオフタイム！
ちゃんと楽しんでるかな？
日頃のアークスの任務を忘れて
好きなところへ出掛けられるから
そのまま戻って来ない人もいるんだって！
貴方には戻ってもらわないと困るけど
ちょっとリリーパあたりなんか、どう？"
